comment.author: 25378670@N08
comment._content: Hehe, yes, I love the expressions! I like pictures of people standing at their door; here's one in my collection: www.flickr.com/photos/adambangor/4429075925/in/set-721576...

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Fine, she'll come to the door for a photo, but don't expect her to put down the knitting needles.   I added her to my gallery, "Knitting Across the Commons."  She'll be in good company there!

comment.author: 47201412@N02
comment._content: Such wonderful expressions ... and a great simple composition by the photographer, using the brick pattern as a frame.
